name: Synch
headline: Supercharging Sales
description: Your Sales and Sales Ops team in a unified platform. No setup, Salesforce SSO and go.

founders.name: Daniel Ruiz, Founder
founders.description: CEO at Synch. Previously Compound & Divvy Homes.

# Supercharging Sales
Your Sales and Sales Ops team in a unified platform. No setup, Salesforce SSO and go.
Thank you! [Schedule a call](https://www.withsynch.com/<#request-access>) to get started.
Oops! Something went wrong while submitting the form.

## Your existing data, schema, workflows
## Supercharged
### No implementation time
Works immediately with your SFDC schema.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e885fb3600948125ec2983_salesforce-cloud.png)
Your existing schema
Closed Won
Negotiation/Review
Id. Decision Makers
Prospecting
Closed Lost
--east coast
--west coast
_danger
_healthy
_important
### Salesforce SSO and Go
One click setup. No multiple accounts to manage.
Welcome to Synch
Log in with your existing Salesforce account
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e88bc9fe4d2bd8b4e8f79d_salesforce-logo.png)
Sign in with Salesforce
### No more point solutions
Stop managing 15 vendors. All the features you need in a single product.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e88ec874542ac4a7151295_solutions-logo.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ef387d92426212d50c0d91_solutions2.png)
### Shared analytics suite
Analytics across all these products.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e8958e40130f8def5cc81f_analytics-tabs.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e8958e64e807ad609182be_read.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e8958e990647778f62c043_write.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e8958ef9900e3039da07dc_salesforce-logo-large.png)
### AI-assistant
Do anything using natural language.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65faf8086ffb0a69e06672f3_ai-assistent-chats.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65faf8b8f10a400f0bcf6aa7_ai-assistent-btn.png)
## Trusted by teams at
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66d1f5ed7c2e698c39f7358d_773abf09-47fc-466d-8da3-369bf62c120b.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/67a424233c562061c4de0187_Pipe_Technologies_Inc_Logo.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e73e18c7d643b191fa5994_coast.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66dc95913361c83ddd23aa09_tome-logo-AI.02.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66286184fcca2d6cc5c9c77d_superhuman-logo-vector%201.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e73e192690bee30c4b283b_mercury.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e73e1864826dcd7ad9db72_finley.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/67239ca20ff2214e85e9d8de_koala_Logo_light_background_1_c27d40c870.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/664d222a9a7d695f6cfccc7b_Jetty_wordmark_black_Logo.jpg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/67a42440357e0ec29b5bd969_Logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66a711c90bc8e07b20df6f40_encamp-logo.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66a711c0574343d34ebc8f4c_620d2f9aa4649b24c76fe8bc_GreenSpark-FullLogo-p-500.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/668b0974c39b281a2417c010_664ffc89ff539b531cc46813_Clay-logo-black-2024.webp)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/662861b86fa0a5d1bbeb2a32_5f35c1f472cfa91b40454a13_Fundr%20Logo%20Color.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/67239ca233deecc47fa5b559_light.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66c373db3bdcd706fdfffba1_63a5ad2285e33d740f3382ed_Logo.svg)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/66fc79e84f15ba98305c2382_Redis-Logo.png)![](https://cdn. ## Same platform, two workspaces
Your GTM point-solutions use the same customer data sources, so we bundled these products into a single platform with shared data and analytics across the SKUs.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e74179deb8f80fda61c8eb_sales-workspace.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e74179a6b4770d8b5f05f9_sales-ops-workspace.png)
For 
## Sales
## Sales Ops
[Sales](https://www.withsynch.com/<#sales>)[Sales Ops](https://www.withsynch.com/<#sales-ops>)
[Forecasting](https://www.withsynch.com/<#forecasting>)[Funnel Analytics](https://www.withsynch.com/<#funnel-analytics>)[Deal Review](https://www.withsynch.com/<#deal-review>)[Pipeline Management](https://www.withsynch.com/<#pipeline>)
### Forecasting
Predictive sales outcome platform for managers and reps that takes into account historical team member performance and uses AI to spot trends.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e9d16a4c5e995b1b26f6a2_chart-header.svg)
### Funnel Analytics
Out-of-the-box analysis of your pipeline. Pre-built dashboards and reports to give your team immediate access to the data insights you need.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e9e1ee20e955f747823d54_analytics-cards.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eec403efb40cf6ca926d59_analytics-card-page-2.png)
### Deal Review
Platform to review your active pipeline and determine the likelihood of a sale. Leverages customer and historical data to make recommendations humans may not consider.
Pipeline
$226,000
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ead924148d5984087d00d6_kanban-row-1.png)
Best case
$299,657
$93,503
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eadb64207c3ec94baacaea_kanban-best-case-cell.png)
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eadbeeedbeeb4908f7c1c0_kanban-active-start.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eadbee5d90eaede6e1ba4d_kanban-active-end.png)
Commit
$317,929
$524,083
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eec20c9871f01310c834ec_kanban-row-3.png)
Closed
$376,699
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eade3dbf8a93b8e2e627ac_kanban-row-4.png)
### Pipeline Management
Inline editing of your accounts, contacts, and opportunities with real-time bidirectional data sync to Salesforce.
Opportunities
Accounts
Leads
Contacts
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb33dc6d05358096071a9a_table-opps.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb33dc6e663bcaa07c0c96_table_accounts.png)
[Assignments](https://www.withsynch.com/<#assignments>)[Automations](https://www.withsynch.com/<#automations>)[Reporting & Analytics](https://www.withsynch.com/<#reporting>)[Text to Rules](https://www.withsynch.com/<#text>)[Alerts](https://www.withsynch.com/<#alerts>)[Mass Editing](https://www.withsynch.com/<#mass-editing>)[Auto Join](https://www.withsynch.com/<#auto-join>)
### Assignments
Logic-based lead routing to build account or lead lists deployed directly into a reps pipeline.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb427a9f8ec1acad48537f_assign-pop-up.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb3f52662288a1c19c57b7_assign-btn.png)
Express logistics and transports
$3,000,500
United Oil & Gas Corp
$3,000,500
Office Cowork Inc.
$3,000,500
Breakfast Food Cereal Co.
$3,000,500
### Automations
Deploy complex flows/Apex classes into your sandbox or production environment using simple natural language prompts.
Build a flow when client_health is changed to Low, update customer_priority to High, and email their account_manager if they are a high revenue client. Otherwise, do nothing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e5681bcff45097bd72_automations-layer-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e598fd26e57435ddde_automations-layer-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e5486f9d1746175deb_automations-layer-3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e510b6f7cb49668489_automations-layer-4.png)
### Reporting & Analytics
Use plaintext to generate reports and data vizulations of your SFDC data. You can one click deploy the reports or Data-Viz back to SFDC.
Show me Accounts with Revenue over $100M, Funding over $25M
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eeeb6da4dde06f12a1abdb_reporting-table.png)
### Text to Validation Rule Fields New Objects
Use plaintext to generate validation rules, new fields, new rollup fields, or new objects in SFDC.
If a contract is activated it must have a term length and start date
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eef14d31aa575ae807769f_code-frame.png)
### Alerts
Define conditions for deals and accounts where you want your reps or RevOps team to receive Slack alerts. Spin up deal rooms seamlessly using plain-text conditions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb46386618655fa43d0435_alerts.png)
### Mass Editing SFDC Data with Logic
In a situation like account reassignment when a rep leaves, use plain text to mass transform data in SFDC.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65fb1e2fa2c39648332bd1ff_mass-editing-base.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65fb1e2fee38ff5f2ebdf280_mass-editing-start.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65fb1e2fa2c39648332bd202_mass-editing-end.png)
Change industry to manufacturing
### Auto Join Reports & Rerun on Scheduled Cadence
Automatically join SFDC reports, generate new arithmetic or logical formulas, and export to CSV. You can schedule these data transformations on any regular cadence.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb4638b6c6cac2d556abdf_auto-join.png)
## The best leaders run their team on Synch
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ef6006739c7463032ce562_mercury-logo.png)
> “Synch helps save us hours of dev time making us more productive throughout the day.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eaec53dfecbb91a0f3ab89_1695147587961.jpeg)
Jeremy Brown
RevOps, Mercury
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eaeb96514d452fe0d7d5ef_Finley_Logo%201.png)
> “Using Synch lets us supercharge our GTM motion with data insights & recommendations”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eaec53afb764decf090426_1613525863027.jpeg)
Jeremy Tsui
CEO, Finley
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e73e18c7d643b191fa5994_coast.png)
> “Synch is like having a salesforce consultant at your fingertips. From assigning leads to building automations, Synch takes the hassle out of SFDC work and allows us to be more agile and deploy updates in no time.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ef193e073b339b14f48701_1516573454786.jpeg)
Tobi Idowu
Director of Growth, Coast

## Sales Ops
Sales⟨4⟩Sales Ops⟨5⟩
Forecasting⟨6⟩Funnel Analytics⟨7⟩Deal Review⟨8⟩Pipeline Management⟨9⟩
### Forecasting
Predictive sales outcome platform for managers and reps that takes into account historical team member performance and uses AI to spot trends.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e9d16a4c5e995b1b26f6a2_chart-header.svg)
### Funnel Analytics
Out-of-the-box analysis of your pipeline. Pre-built dashboards and reports to give your team immediate access to the data insights you need.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e9e1ee20e955f747823d54_analytics-cards.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eec403efb40cf6ca926d59_analytics-card-page-2.png)
### Deal Review
Platform to review your active pipeline and determine the likelihood of a sale. Leverages customer and historical data to make recommendations humans may not consider.
Pipeline
$226,000
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ead924148d5984087d00d6_kanban-row-1.png)

![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eade3dbf8a93b8e2e627ac_kanban-row-4.png)
### Pipeline Management
Inline editing of your accounts, contacts, and opportunities with real-time bidirectional data sync to Salesforce.
Opportunities
Accounts
Leads
Contacts
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb33dc6d05358096071a9a_table-opps.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb33dc6e663bcaa07c0c96_table_accounts.png)
Assignments⟨10⟩Automations⟨11⟩Reporting & Analytics⟨12⟩Text to Rules⟨13⟩Alerts⟨14⟩Mass Editing⟨15⟩Auto Join⟨16⟩
### Assignments
Logic-based lead routing to build account or lead lists deployed directly into a reps pipeline.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb427a9f8ec1acad48537f_assign-pop-up.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb3f52662288a1c19c57b7_assign-btn.png)

Breakfast Food Cereal Co.
$3,000,500
### Automations
Deploy complex flows/Apex classes into your sandbox or production environment using simple natural language prompts.
Build a flow when client_health is changed to Low, update customer_priority to High, and email their account_manager if they are a high revenue client. Otherwise, do nothing
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e5681bcff45097bd72_automations-layer-1.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e598fd26e57435ddde_automations-layer-2.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e5486f9d1746175deb_automations-layer-3.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eee7e510b6f7cb49668489_automations-layer-4.png)
### Reporting & Analytics
Use plaintext to generate reports and data vizulations of your SFDC data. You can one click deploy the reports or Data-Viz back to SFDC.
Show me Accounts with Revenue over $100M, Funding over $25M
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eeeb6da4dde06f12a1abdb_reporting-table.png)
### Text to Validation Rule Fields New Objects
Use plaintext to generate validation rules, new fields, new rollup fields, or new objects in SFDC.
If a contract is activated it must have a term length and start date
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eef14d31aa575ae807769f_code-frame.png)
### Alerts
Define conditions for deals and accounts where you want your reps or RevOps team to receive Slack alerts. Spin up deal rooms seamlessly using plain-text conditions.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb46386618655fa43d0435_alerts.png)
### Mass Editing SFDC Data with Logic
In a situation like account reassignment when a rep leaves, use plain text to mass transform data in SFDC.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65fb1e2fa2c39648332bd1ff_mass-editing-base.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65fb1e2fee38ff5f2ebdf280_mass-editing-start.png)![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65fb1e2fa2c39648332bd202_mass-editing-end.png)
Change industry to manufacturing
### Auto Join Reports & Rerun on Scheduled Cadence
Automatically join SFDC reports, generate new arithmetic or logical formulas, and export to CSV. You can schedule these data transformations on any regular cadence.
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eb4638b6c6cac2d556abdf_auto-join.png)
## The best leaders run their team on Synch
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ef6006739c7463032ce562_mercury-logo.png)
> “Synch helps save us hours of dev time making us more productive throughout the day.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eaec53dfecbb91a0f3ab89_1695147587961.jpeg)
Jeremy Brown
RevOps, Mercury
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eaeb96514d452fe0d7d5ef_Finley_Logo%201.png)
> “Using Synch lets us supercharge our GTM motion with data insights & recommendations”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65eaec53afb764decf090426_1613525863027.jpeg)
Jeremy Tsui
CEO, Finley
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65e73e18c7d643b191fa5994_coast.png)
> “Synch is like having a salesforce consultant at your fingertips. From assigning leads to building automations, Synch takes the hassle out of SFDC work and allows us to be more agile and deploy updates in no time.”
![](https://cdn.prod.website-files.com/65e6e8d0df53c17f17c3f2ef/65ef193e073b339b14f48701_1516573454786.jpeg)

Director of Growth, Coast

generated_description:
**Company Overview: Synch**

Founded in 2023, Synch is a forward-thinking startup based in New York that aims to revolutionize the sales landscape. Their mission? *Supercharging Sales* by integrating the sales and sales ops teams into a single, seamless platform.

The startup emerged from Y Combinator's Batch S23, gaining traction quickly with a small, dynamic team of just four employees. They recently completed a $3M seed funding round led by Jack Altman and Haystack, clearly signaling that investors see potential in their innovative approach.

**What They Do**

Synch positions itself as a unified platform that eliminates the common hassles of sales operations—no setup is required, and you can use Salesforce Single Sign-On (SSO) for seamless integration. It's all about minimizing friction and maximizing effectiveness; users can dive right into functionalities like forecasting, funnel analytics, deal reviews, and pipeline management.

What stands out about Synch is its ability to work directly with existing Salesforce data. This means companies can utilize their current data schema and workflows with zero implementation time. Imagine logging in with your existing Salesforce credentials and instantly accessing a robust suite of tools that eliminate the need to juggle multiple vendors.

**Core Features**

Synch’s platform boasts an impressive array of features for both sales and sales ops:

- **Sales Tools:** Users can dive into forecasting, analyze pipelines, manage deals, and track analytics—all in one place.
- **Sales Ops Features:** The platform offers automation, easy assignment mechanisms, and straightforward analytics reporting.
- **AI Assistance:** With a natural language interface, users can create complex flows and generate reports just by asking, which significantly lowers the barriers to entry for effective tool utilization.

The platform also breaks free from offering scattered point solutions by providing a single product that brings together essential features, thus streamlining operations.

**Community and Trust**

Numerous teams from respected companies such as Mercury and Finley have put their trust in Synch. Users appreciate how the tool helps save time and enhances productivity, with testimonials highlighting the ease of automating routine tasks and managing Salesforce data seamlessly.

**In Conclusion**

Synch isn't just another SaaS tool; it’s a smart, integrated platform designed with the understanding that in today’s fast-paced business landscape, efficiency and clarity are paramount. It allows sales teams to use their existing Salesforce data to supercharge their operations without the typical headaches associated with implementing new systems. If you're a sales or operations leader looking to elevate your game, Synch just might be the partner you've been searching for. 

For more information, check out their website: [Synch](https://www.withsynch.com/).
